PERSONA.NAME: Alonso
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: King of Naples, brother to Sebastian, father to Ferdinand

PERSONA.NAME: Prospero
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The rightful Duke of Milan, brother to Antonio, shipwrecked with daughter Miranda.

PERSONA.NAME: Antonio
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The usurping Duke of Milan, brother to Prospero

PERSONA.NAME: Ferdinand
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Alonso, Prince of Naples, falls in love with Miranda.

PERSONA.NAME: Caliban,
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A savage and deformed slave, son of the dead witch Sycorax.

PERSONA.NAME: Trinculo
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A witty jester, tries to overthrow Prospero.

PERSONA.NAME: Miranda
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Prospero, falls in love with Ferdinand.

PERSONA.NAME: Ariel
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An airy spirit, once enslaved to Sycorax.
